document.full_text: niger's junta said saturday's election of a civilian leader could serve as a model for democracy across africa, as voters turned out for a run-off between two presidential rivals.
document.title: junta hails "model" vote as niger chooses leader
lines_and_colors: niger's junta said saturday's election of a civilian leader could serve as a model for democracy across africa, as voters turned out for a run-off between two presidential rivals.
